full_summary:
## Rigid Inflatable Boat Refit Tender Announcement

### Reference Number
WS3883605715-Doc3945490822

### Solicitation Number
WS3883605715

### Tender Status
* **English:** Expiring -- This tender is soon to be closed.
* **French:** Expiré -- Cet appel d’offres expirera bientôt.

### Tender Details
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals to carry out the refit of a marine vessel for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP). Here are the key details:

#### Description
The refit of the Titan T240 Rigid Inflatable Boat (RIB) with a cabin design, which is currently located in Nanaimo, British Columbia.

#### Requirements
* **1.** Pick up the vessel from Nanaimo, BC
* **2.** Deliver the refurbished vessel to Quadra Island, Quathiaski Cove, BC

#### Tender Schedule
Please note the following important dates:

* **1.** Publication Date: 2023-03-31
* **2.** Tender Closing Date: 2023-05-24T14:00:00 (Expire)
* **3.** Expected Contract Start: 2023-06-16
* **4.** Expected Contract End: 2023-07-31

#### Key Contact
To respond to questions and seek additional information, please contact:

* Mary Parsons
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)
* E-mail: [mary.pharons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mary.pharons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to trade agreements in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Regions of Delivery
The delivery of the refurbished vessel is required to be to Quadra Island, Quathiaski Cove, British Columbia.

### Contracting Documents
 Please visit the [Discovery Ariba](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15873813?extsite=MTU4NzM4MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) website to obtain the tender documents.

### Evaluation Criteria
* The lowest price proposal will be the basis of evaluation.
